explains: n. 约鲁巴人（生活在非洲）；约鲁巴语

sentences.en: Young and old, rural and urban, Ibo, Hausa and Yoruba: each group sees the world differently.
sentences.cn: 年轻人和老人，农村人和城市人，伊博人，豪萨族人和约鲁巴人：每个群体的世界观都是不同的。

sentences.en: For example, the women from Yoruba tribe in West Africa consume plenty of cassava, a type of yam or sweet potato.
sentences.cn: 例如，西非约鲁巴部落的妇女食用大量的木薯。木薯是一种甜薯或者甜土豆。

sentences.en: Center of a powerful Yoruba kingdom until the late 17th century, it is an agricultural market with varied industries.
sentences.cn: 直到17世纪后期，这时一直是强大的约鲁巴王朝的中心。
